data.name: About
data.value: About

data.name: About_link
data.value: If you would like further information regarding the exciting plans we have, then please contact us by email on: contact@exclusivecard.co.uk

data.name: About_us
data.value: We are here and we have so many exciting new ideas to bring to you over the coming weeks and months. Our website will continue to grow and improve rapidly over a short period. More merchants are being added all the time and in addition our website will continue to gain new features and unique options of how to use your cashback.

data.name: AHB
data.value: Account Holder Benefits

data.name: CEC
data.value: to contact the {{Name}} Team to find out more and discuss your options.

data.name: CF
data.value: Complete Flexibility, 24/7 Dashboard

data.name: CF_1
data.value: Use the 24/7 dashboard to see where your cashback is currently invested. Withdraw your cash whenever you want or you can even top it up with your own money using our optional boost your investment feature.

data.name: CPO
data.value: Corporate Partner Options

data.name: CPO_1
data.value: Gift your customers and/or employees your choice of membership:

data.name: CPO_a
data.value: Free Membership Account (Members have the option to upgrade themselves).

data.name: CPO_b
data.value: Upgraded Diamond Membership Account

data.name: CPO_c
data.value: We can even create for your company a fully branded White Label Rewards Site offering incredible brand awareness every time your members shop online. Please ask for more details.

data.name: CPO_d
data.value: We also offer a Benefit Rewards plan that will allow 30% of your members cashback to be diverted and donated to a good cause of your choice. Once again please ask for more details.

data.name: C_Reward
data.value: Customer Rewards

data.name: C_Reward_1
data.value: If customer retention is amongst your list of priorities, a customer reward scheme is essential. Gift a personal Exclusive Rewards account to each of your loyal customers, offering them extensive savings, cashback deals and thousands of voucher code and promotional benefits for using your services or product. Improve customer satisfaction and brand loyalty will follow.

data.name: DMU
data.value: Diamond Membership Upgrade

data.name: DMU_1
data.value: TBC

data.name: E_Benefits
data.value: Employee Benefits

data.name: E_Benefits_1
data.value: Happy employees are productive employees, and happiness comes from job satisfaction. Whilst many factors effect job satisfaction, more than a third of employees admit employee benefits are amongst their top consideration when accepting a new job.

data.name: E_Benefits_2
data.value: Exclusive Rewards is the perfect addition to any employee benefits scheme, offering hundreds of pounds per year savings on things they would buy anyway.

data.name: F_Account
data.value: Free Account

data.name: F_Account_1
data.value: Enjoy all the benefits of your {{Name}} account for free, for life. Or why not upgrade to our Diamond membership for just £{{DiamondCost}} to access higher cashback rates and incredible high street and leisure discounts that will save you hundreds of pounds per year.

data.name: F_Business
data.value: For Businesses

data.name: F_Employer
data.value: For Employers

data.name: Lead
data.value: {{Name}} has arrived to revolutionise the employee benefit, customer loyalty and charitable or donation markets.

data.name: Lead_1
data.value: Partnered with TAM Asset Management to manage client's investment accounts, {{Name}} makes investment easy for the everyday individual, and with no personal cash outlay required.

data.name: Lead_2
data.value: The platform is by invitation only and combines cashback from thousands of retailers and daily updated voucher codes and promotions saving our members potentially hundreds of pounds per year.

data.name: MS
data.value: Multiply Your Savings

data.name: MS_1
data.value: Our {{Name}} investment account could generate 6% profit per year, compared to an average of just 0.83% interest on a conventional deposit account.

data.name: Retail
data.value: Over 4000 Retailers

data.name: Retail_1
data.value: Claim exclusive cashback and discounts from over 4000 favourite retailers.

data.name: Reward
data.value: Why choose Exclusive Rewards?

data.name: Work
data.value: How Does it Work?

data.name: Work_1
data.value: New members sign up with their unique free code provided to them by their introducer/employer or corporate institution.

data.name: Work_2
data.value: A member would now log in to their account and select their desired retailer they wish to shop with.

data.name: Work_3
data.value: Once a member has clicked the retailer cashback button and has been redirected to the retailer's website, they would simply shop as normal and the cashback will be applied to their Rewards account

data.name: Work_4
data.value: Upon reaching a balance of £5.00 in their cashback account, members can withdraw all or part of their cashback balance to a bank account of their choice..

data.name: Work_5
data.value: Our optional benefit reward plan allows for 30% of cashback earned by a member to be donated to a beneficiary. If this plan is selected the donated balance will display on the members account page.

data.name: Work_6
data.value: We also offer thousands of daily voucher code and promotional deals via the platform and these additional benefits can usually be used in conjunction with cashback.

data.name: Work_7
data.value: Money is accessible at any point, via the withdrawal button on their cashback account.

data.name: Title
data.value: For Businesses

data.name: CPO_2
data.value: Remember, an Exclusive Rewards account can be operated as a conventional cashback account or can be connected to our investment account option. This is the personal choice of the individual user and can be selected when opening their Exclusive Rewards account.

data.name: Work_8
data.value: Money is sent back to the customer but as their investment account is already open, any cashback received in the future goes direct to the investment account without requiring the £10.00 start off balance

data.name: F_Account_2
data.value: Enjoy all the benefits of your {{Name}} account for free, for life. Or why not upgrade to our Diamond membership to access higher cashback rates and incredible high street and leisure discounts that will save you hundreds of pounds per year.
